metadata.title: CVE-2021-3533 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Ansible if an ansible user sets ANSIBLE_ASYNC_DIR to asubdirectory of a world writable directory. When this occurs, there is arace condition on the managed machine. A malicious, non-privileged accounton the remote machine can exploit the race condition to access the asyncresult data. This flaw affects Ansible Tower 3.7 and Ansible AutomationPlatform 1.2.

criterions.comment: ansible package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
